Summary: ball of light floating in sky
divs: Sighting DetailsWhen I saw the UFO, my dad, Bob, and I were driving to another friends' home to have a sushi BBQ. Then when I looked at the sky, I saw a brilliant white light floating light. Many people call me a UFO enthusiast, and say I am crazy and make up stories. But I know what I saw, and what I saw was a UFO. I screamed, "DAD! A UFO! LOOK TO THE SKY OVER THERE!" But he couldn't look because he was driving, and Bob was on the other side of the car. I was really exciting and afraid at the same time. Then as the car moved on, the UFO moved behind a thick cloud, and I had lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Magalia
There were no other sightings in Magalia on or around February 29th 2008
